```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
dat <- datasets::anscombe
datLong <- data.frame(
  group  = rep(1:4, each = 11),
    x = unlist(dat[,c(1:4)]),
    y = unlist(dat[,c(5:8)]), 
    row.names = NULL)
library(GGally)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
ggpairs(dat)
ggpairs(datLong)
```
